data.name: GluePoint
desc: A GluePoint could be attached to a shape or to a page.
If a GluePoint is attached to a shape, it is moved when the shape moves. The ends of connectors can be attached to GluePoint.

items.name: Alignment
lines: The alignment of a GluePoint defines how the position of the point is affected by resizing the parent Shape.

items.name: EscapeDirection
lines: This is the direction in which the connector line leaves the GluePoint.

items.name: Position
lines: This is the position of this GluePoint.

items.name: PositionAbsolute
lines: If this is TRUE, then the position of this GluePoint is absolute on a page and is not relative to a shape.
